concept.title: 503.405 Misrepresentations or violations of the Covenant Against Contingent Fees.

conbody.p: Employees who suspect or have evidence of violations of the Covenant Against Contingent Fees must report the matter to the contracting officer as well as to the Office of Inspector General. If appropriate, the Office of Inspector General will forward a report and recommendation to the Department of Justice.
